Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K with a frequency of 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0 GHz

Game information
 --------------------------------

Assassin's Creed Unity - Action adventure that takes you to Paris during 
the French Revolution. You will learn the history of the Arno - boys, by 
chance became embroiled in the bloody events of the period. You are waiting 
for new opportunities in the management of this character. Change and the 
appearance of objects and their characteristics. You will be able to play 
Assassin's Creed Unity with friends, and some tasks to perform even three. 
Witness the legendary historical events!

Features Gold Edition and Pre-Order DLC
--------------------------------

Additional tasks for a single game - 30 minutes of playing time
Chemical Revolution: Antoine Laurent de Lavoisier called "the father
 of modern chemistry." He was able to develop a formula for creating 
a poisoned bombs. Unfortunately, he was kidnapped before he could give 
it to you. Help him escape from the kidnappers and return formula bombs.

Additional package "Brotherhood" includes:
- Axe "splitter armor" and a battle ax
- Pants National Guard
- Kara spear
- Quest "Victim of Science"
Season pass
More than 5 hours of playing time in the campaign: help Arno restore order

Assassin's Creed Chronicles: China - additional jobs in China of
